name: Hariharan
descriptionAboutYou: I'm a Disciplined and Dedicated Software Engineer with 2 years of experience in Full Stack Development and 4 months experience as an Intern in Full Stack Development, with a passion for Web Application Development and Mobile Application Development. I am proficient in building React JS, React Native, Node JS and Java with Spring Boot applications.

domains.FrontEndDeveloper: I have Experience in building Web Application's with good Css and Responsive UI's using React JS and React Native

domains.BackEndDeveloper: I have Experience in building robust, scalable, and secure server-side applications using Node JS and Java with SpringBoot.

domains.CRM Integrations: I have Experience in Integrating the Web Application with CRM's like Salesforce, Zendesk, Freshdesk and Freshsales using their Respective Api's.

experiences: Worked in building Admin Portal Application
Worked in building Live AgentToolBar Application
Worked in the Integration of Live Agent Toolbar with Crm's like Salesforce, Zendesk, Freshdesk and Freshsales
